title: 1 BEDROOM Off Mass Ave  --Heat & HW INC--  Parking-GRANITE---BUS 77/79
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 35719742', 'Rent: $1,795 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Broker Fee: 1/2', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'One bedroom unit located in a 3 story 12 unit apartment building in Arlington.', 'Galley kitchen with granite and gas stove, large dining/living area, good closet space,brand new windows, and freshly painted.', 'Hardwood floors throughout.', '1 car off street parking, coin op laundry.', 'storage unit included.', 'Bus line is right outside your door (77 & 79), walk to shops and restaurants on Mass Ave.', 'Minuteman bike trail, Easy commute to Cambridge, Davis Square, and Alewife.', 'Heat & HW Included!!', 'Terms: 12 month lease, first, security, half month fee.', 'Good credit and references a must!', 'No pets', 'Call to schedule a showing today!', 'FEATURES', 'Ceramic Tiles', 'GAS STOVE', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Hard wood Laminate flooring', 'Laundry in Building', 'Storage', 'GMRE is an "Equal Housing Opportunity" Real Estate Agency.', ' It is against the Law of MA to refuse to rent to Families with Children or to otherwise discriminate in housing rentals.']
